text: Quantum theory may mean: *Quantum mechanics, a branch of physics explaining the physical behaviours at the molecular, atomic and sub-atomic levels *Quantum field theory, a general type of quantum theory, which includes: ** Quantum electrodynamics ** Quantum chromodynamics ** Electroweak interaction * Quantum gravity, a general term for theories intended to quantize general relativity == Related pages == *Planck constant *Stefanâ€“Boltzmann law
title: Quantum theory
